snippet: A federal judge in New York has agreed to hear oral arguments in a lawsuit filed against the United Nations by advocates for Haitian victims of the deadly cholera epidemic.
abstract: Federal judge in New York agrees to hear oral arguments in a lawsuit filed against the United Nations by advocates for Haitian victims of the deadly cholera epidemic that first appeared on the island four years ago.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge in New York has agreed to hear oral arguments in a lawsuit filed against the United Nations by advocates for Haitian victims of the deadly cholera epidemic.

headline.main: Lawsuit Against U.N. on the Spread of Cholera Epidemic in Haiti Advances
headline.print_headline: Judge Will Hear Case Against U.N. on Outbreak of Cholera in Haiti
